name: EchoClicker
description:
GATHER AS MANY ECHOES AS YOU CAN !

Welcome to EchoClicker !

my first time working on an incremental game !

Made for a private jam for school,

I took it as an opportunity to learn more about data management and serializations.

 This one might have the potential to have more updates, a better balancing and also a proper phone release.

Hope you'll like it !

Some UI Elements were made by Admurin
